The Related Discourses

3. Causation (cf. SN 12: Nidāna saṃyutta)

The Causation group consists of 78 sutras when abbreviated sutra variants are counted. The material spans fascicles 12, 14, and 15 of Taisho No. 99, which have been reordered according to Yinshun’s reconstruction. Below is a list of the English translations currently available.

Note: Previous English translations currently available at SuttaCentral are referenced below. The reader should be aware that titles for SA sutras are supplied by the translator(s). The sutra numbering follows Yinshun’s reconstruction. The Taisho sutra numbers are noted for reference ("[T 99.xxx]").

  • 11. Connected with Emptiness, Conformable to the Dharma of Conditioned Genesis (Choong) [T 99.293]
  • 14. The Dharma of Arising by Causal Condition and the Dharmas Arisen by Causal Condition (Choong) [T 99.296]
  • 15. The Great Discourse on the Emptiness of Dharmas (Choong) [T 99.297]
  • 17. The Dharma of Conditioned Arising (Choong) [T 99.299]
  • 18. Empty of the Eternalist and Annihilationist Views (The middle way) (Choong) [T 99.300]
  • 19. Establishing right view (Choong) [T 99.301]
  • 71. The Nutriments (Pierquet) [T 99.371]
  • 74. The Nutriments (Pierquet) [T 99.374]
